passage_text: Best Answer: There are 99 Gold Bricks. You get Gold Bricks when you complete a level for the first time in Story Mode. You also get Gold Bricks when you earn True Jedi status (based on # of studs collected per level and the # required varies on each level) in Story Mode and also in Free Play Mode.
